Package hw8

Class CSE222Map

java.lang.Object
hw8.CSE222Map
public class CSE222Map extends Object
CSE222Map represents a map with coordinates and provides methods for map operations.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected int
    columnValue
    Number of columns of the map.
    protected int[][]
    coordinatesMatrix
    A 2D array to store the map as a 2D matrix of 1s and 0s.
    protected Coordinate
    endPoint
    The end (destination) point.
    protected String
    filename
    Name of the source .txt file.
    protected int
    rowValue
    Number of rows of the map.
    protected Coordinate
    startPoint
    The starting (source) point.

  • Method Details

    • convertPNG

      protected void convertPNG()
      Converts the map to a PNG image and saves it as a file.

    • writePath

      protected void writePath(List<Coordinate> coordinates, String filename, String type)
      Writes the given path coordinates to a text file.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - the list of coordinates representing the path
      filename - the name of the file to write the path
      type - the name of the algorithm that produced the path ( Dijkstra or BFS )

    • drawLine

      protected void drawLine(List<Coordinate> path, String filename, String type)
      Draws a line on the generated map image using the given path coordinates.
      Parameters:
      path - the list of coordinates representing the path
      filename - the name of the generated map image file
      type - the name of the algorithm that produced the path ( Dijkstra or BFS )

    • coordinatesMatrixFillerMethod

      private void coordinatesMatrixFillerMethod(String filename)
      Fills the coordinates matrix with values read from the file.
      Parameters:
      filename - the name of the map file containing the coordinates

    • fileRowCounter

      private int fileRowCounter(String fileName)
      Returns the number of rows in the file with the given file name.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the file to be counted
      Returns:
      the number of rows in the file, or -1 if an error occurs

    • fileColumnCounter

      private int fileColumnCounter(String fileName)
      Returns the number of columns in the file with the given file name.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the file to be counted
      Returns:
      the number of columns in the file, or -1 if an error occurs

    • sourceDestinationSetter

      private int sourceDestinationSetter(String fileName)
      Sets the start and end points from the file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the map file that contains the start and end points
      Returns:
      0 if successful, -1 if an error occurs
